div.head: To the Reader.
div.l: IN euerie Countrie, diuers wonders be
Not represented to the Eare and Eye
Of euery Natiue, then hard doome forbeare,
If from the Vniuerse strange nowes you heare.
Those very children whom one wombe doth frame,
Varie shape, nature, vse; to expect the same
In euery worke, is Gods great worke to blame.
Since then Varieties please God and Men;
Thank him whose sweat and cost demonstrates them.
